name: Day of the Trumplings
description: Nobody knew where they came from…. nobody knew what they wanted… until it was too late! Trumplings! Frothing little vessels of rage have come to town, to knock down our Big Beautiful Walls and move their master into the Whitehouse! Use Gun Control to save America!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: I3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 334 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
